qa_pairs.answer: Both Christianity and Islam have entered the country with a political mandate, shaping events and religious institutions along with their religious agendas.
qa_pairs.cultural_golden_answer: This phenomenon is characteristic of the Philippines' colonial history, where foreign powers imposed their faiths on local populations.
